ygData.subject: Re: Gladiator Tournament
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello, I d be happy to participate in something like this, one other thing you could do is have some overseer/s and have players send their savegames in to
ygData.rawEmail:
X-Digest-Num: 25
Message-ID: <17248.25.87.959279670@...>
Date: Sun, 21 Mar 1999 19:21:02 +1100
From: "Storey" <storey@...
Subject: Re: Gladiator Tournament

Hello,
I'd be happy to participate in something like this, one other thing
you could do is have some overseer/s and have players send their
savegames in to prove what they have obtained.  That way the
overseer/s could determine if the stats the players have a actually
possible to obtain.

Cya's,
David Storey


>From: maxim@... (Ape)
>
>>From: "Seth Mitchell" <smitchell@...>
>>
>>> I'm thinking it would be cool if we got some kind
>>> of Gladiator tournament going on.  I've written
>>> out a basic outline of how the rules would work
>>> on my own, and would be happy to organize it, but
>>> I need to know if anyone would participate.
>>
>>The only problem is that multiplayer Gladiator still is not possible
>>unless it is on the same computer.  This means that only singler-
>>player touraments are possible.  The problem with that is that
>>people can cheat in single player mode.
>
>Well...as long as we had no prizes or anything I don't think cheating
would
>be a problem...I mean would be the motivation to cheat for something
like
>this? I think it would be fun, and if no one cheated it would be
interesting
>to see the results.
>-Maxim
>
